summary: A daemon that can summarize and manage discord-channels with a focus on biometric static-site-generator.

ai_summary.text: A background daemon that summarizes Discord channels and automates a biometric static-site-generator to publish privacy-aware, organized static knowledge hubs. It streamlines content workflows while enforcing biometric redaction and compliance.
examples: Action 1: Configure the biometric static-site-generator daemon to ingest the #dev-updates Discord channel and auto-publish daily conversation summaries to a static site.
Action 2: Attach a biometric redaction policy to the biometric static-site-generator daemon so it removes PII and sensitive biometric markers from Discord messages before rendering pages.
Action 3: Schedule the biometric static-site-generator daemon to generate tag-based archives and RSS feeds for 'biometric', 'daemon', and 'static-site-generator' Discord channels.
